name: Cheers
description:
Cheers is a first person arcade shooter where you play as the town drunk shooting up enemies who have invaded his town and disturbed his sleep.

Grab your trusty firework shooter and be prepared for a fast paced Ale induced adventure.

Cheers was developed for the eJam game jam in 48 hours.


Credits,

Lead Programmer:  Xian Chance
@XianChance on twitter   @xchance on itch

Lead game designer: Cooper Hall

Lead Environment artist: Caleb Shaw
@Caliber5 on itch 
Artstation: caliber5.artstation.com

Lead character artist: Jess Prendergast

https://www.artstation.com/jj_prendergast

FX and UI: Sterling

https://www.artstation.com/ssavoy
